description: Floranow is a curated B2B online marketplace connecting flower growers, consolidators and exporters directly to flower retailers, event planners, hotels and supermarkets.

Flowics works with broadcasters and producers in the sports, media & entertainment industry, helping them to streamline their production workflows to retain and monetize viewers across all digital environments.
Floyd is an e-commerce-based, vertically-integrated furniture brand that makes beautifully-designed furniture for city living.

Fluvip offers a technology platform that allows advertisers to identify the right social content influencers for their campaigns based on artificial intelligence systems; and enables brands to connect with social content influencers in the world through multi-channels, such asTwitter, Instagram, Vine, Facebook, and Blogs.

FlySpaces operates a digital marketplace that provides short-term work and meeting space solutions to entrepreneurs, start-ups, SMEs, and mobile professionals in SEA. For venue owners, FlySpaces acts as a digital marketing platform that connects them to a vast user base to monetize their space.
FOO is a B2B FinTech provider, enabling banks and startups to process their end customers’ peer-to-peer payments, overseas remittance payments, bill payments, and loan applications.
Foodics is a cloud-based restaurant management system.
Foodizz is the first culinary business learning platform in Indonesia.
Foriba is a Regtech company enhancing business productivity by moving paper-based procedures online. The company was acquired by Sovos in 2019.
FormulaFolios offers financial advisors a platform to seamlessly build and manage their books of business.
FortBrasil offers low-income consumers credit through its open private label credit card.
Freeda is a European digital media business that partners with consumer brands to create premium content and native advertising strategies targeting female consumers.
FREZYDERM develops, manufactures and trades dermoceutical products and medical devices.
Fullsand is a vertically integrated beachwear company with operations in design, manufacturing, and distribution, including retail stores.
Funtour is an Uruguayan travel experience company that brings children and teenagers together to explore new parts of the world.
Catering to Mexico’s rising middle and upper-middle classes, GAIA delivers contemporary interior designs to homes across the country at the click of a button.
Game Planet is a video game store which offers new titles and consoles and the option to trade in used games, with a special focus on providing the best customer experience in Mexico.
Geekie employs the power of technology to democratize top quality education for Brazil’s middle and high schoolers.
Genesys focuses on “remote” software applications centered on the tracking of products and people.

GEO Energética has developed an innovative biotechnological process for biogas production reusing the residues of the sugar-alcohol industry. The biogas can be used to generate clean electricity or produce biomethane to replace diesel oil.
